cause.description:
http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2401098768
The "Mike Chow" group on facebook is looking for donations to help fund our cause to take over the world. Any amount will be greatfully accepted. The greater the contribution, the more merciful we will be towards the individual when we do take over the world.
Our goal is to raise over a Billion dollars [CAN] (canadian dollar cauz it's more colourful, like monopoly money) in which we will invest into a "Mike Chow" stock that will be manipulated to maintain its value during the next Market Crash (which Mike Chow #6 is currently working on)
And with every other nation in finacial collapse, we will take over the world!!
1. Global Domination
2. "Mike Chow" Supremacy
3. Universal Dental Plan
cause.name: The "Mike Chow" Cause
